sorular.soru: In which situations are you allowed to stop here?
cevaplar: If you want to drop off a passenger.
If you want to ask for directions.
If you have to wait for a passenger to arrive.
If you want to unload a heavy package.
dogruCevap: If you want to drop off a passenger.
If you want to unload a heavy package.

feedback.metin: It is not allowed to park next to a yellow broken line. Stopping to drop off or pick up passengers is allowed. As is stopping to load or unload goods. These have to be of a significant weight or size. Waiting for a passenger to arrive or asking for directions is considered parking, and is therefore not allowed here.
